channel.title: dividends on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in dividends on FinanClub

item.title: TD
item.description: score:28 Chances: Announcement of common share repurchase up to 90 million shares. Declaration of dividends and positive third quarter financial results. Positive customer satisfaction ranking for banking mobile app. Regulatory approval for normal course issuer bid. Expansion plans with new branch openings and appointments to board.

item.title: LYG
item.description: score:-58 Chances: Positive Q2 2023 earnings call transcript. Lloyds Banking Group beats profit forecasts. Lloyds Banking Group raises dividends. Investor returns of 47% over the last three years. Expansion of banking sector and market recovery. Risks: Challenges from bad loan risks and economic fluctuations.

item.title: ENB
item.description: score:71 Chances: Enbridge has a history of paying dividends and steady growth. Enbridge generated positive distributable cash flow in the second quarter. Enbridge’s natural gas distribution business serves millions of customers. Enbridge reported higher profit in the second quarter due to increased oil volumes.
